snippet.title: Sonic Chaos Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sonic Chaos is a fan game and re-imagining of the 1993 Sega Game Gear and Master System platform game of the same name. Based on the current style of 2D classic Sonic games inspired by Sonic Mania, Sonic Chaos updates the 8 bit visuals of the original and adapts a play style more closely resembling the classic 16-bit games.

Download the demo here - https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-chaos-turquoise-hill-demo.228/

The game has been in development for almost an entire year, where time was spent building a brand new engine from scratch. Sonic Chaos uses this new engine, Crimson Engine, and with it we've strived for classic Sonic gameplay accuracy. The demo will be available to play on August 25th 2018. Links will be posted in this description.

You can catch the demo of the game at this years SAGE 2018, which goes live August 25th 2018.

If you'd like to check out the Soundtrack to the game, it was composed by Michael Staple. The music used in this trailer is called 'Teamwork' also composed by Michael Staple and you can buy it here - https://michaelstaple.bandcamp.com/track/teamwork-promotional-single

Disclaimer - Sonic Chaos (Re-imagined) is in no way affiliated with Segaⓒ or Sonic Team®. "Sonic Chaos" is a non profit project created by fans.
No financial gain is made from this fan made project. No intent to infringe on the copyright or registered trademarks of Sega® or Sonic the Hedgehog®.
Sonic the Hedgehog is a trademark of Sega®. The copyright of "Sonic the Hedgehog" and all associated characters, names, terms, art and music belong to Sega®. All registered trademarks and copyrights belong to Sega® and Sonic Team®.

Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/AStartShow
